sources.title: Dumb Like a Fox (1941)
sources.description: A conceited fox sends an irascible little fox hound, who has never seen a fox before, after a beaver. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dumb-like-a-fox-1941/

metadata.Plot: Pooch, the irascible little fox hound, is terribly disappointed that his father won't allow him to join the fox hunt. Pooch is itching to get himself a fox, but he doesn't even know what one looks like. A certain conceited fox takes advantage of the situation by tricking the naive puppy into believing Jack Beaver is a fox. Unfortunately for Pooch, the splinter-spitting beaver is more than a match for him.
